name: Alarm
Offset
Retransmit
Connectivity check
format:
<style>
  .dashboard-disabled {
    pointer-events: none;
    /*
    opacity: 0.8;
    filter: grayscale(50%);
    */
  }
</style>

<script>
  (function() {
    const CHECK_INTERVAL = 5000;
    const TIMEOUT = 3000;

    function checkServerReachability() {
      const xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
      xhr.open("GET", "/ui", true);
      let isTimedOut = false;
      const timeout = setTimeout(() => {
        isTimedOut = true;
        xhr.abort();
        showWarning();
      }, TIMEOUT);
      xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
        if (xhr.readyState === 4) {
          clearTimeout(timeout);
          if (!isTimedOut && xhr.status === 200) {
            hideWarning();
          } else {
            showWarning();
          }
        }
      };
      xhr.onerror = function() {
        clearTimeout(timeout);
        showWarning();
      };
      xhr.send();
    }

    function showWarning() {
      let el = document.getElementById("server-disconnect-warning");
      if (!el) {
        el = document.createElement("div");
        el.id = "server-disconnect-warning";
        el.style.cssText = "position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;background:#ffdddd;color:#b00;padding:10px;text-align:left;font-weight:bold;;font-size:1.1em;z-index:9999;";
        el.innerHTML = "â   Connection lost";
        document.body.appendChild(el);
      } else {
        el.style.display = "block";
      }
      //document.body.classList.add("dashboard-disabled");
    }

    function hideWarning() {
      const el = document.getElementById("server-disconnect-warning");
      if (el) {
        el.style.display = "none";
      }
      //document.body.classList.remove("dashboard-disabled");
    }

    setInterval(checkServerReachability, CHECK_INTERVAL);
    checkServerReachability();
  })();
</script>

name: Disable text selection
format:
<style>
    /* Disable text selection across the entire dashboard */
    body, .nr-dashboard-template, .nr-dashboard-container {
        user-select: none;
        -webkit-user-select: none; /* Safari/Chrome */
        -moz-user-select: none; /* Firefox */
        -ms-user-select: none; /* Internet Explorer */
    }
</style>

name: Offset

info: Dummy block used as a spacer

name: Grayout 1
format:
<style>
.grayout {
    pointer-events: none;
    filter: opacity(50%);
    /*display: none;*/
}
</style>

<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(value) {
        const controls = document.querySelectorAll('.grayout-target');
        controls.forEach(el => {
            if (!value) {
                el.classList.add('grayout');
            } else {
                el.classList.remove('grayout');
            }
        });
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Grayout 2
format:
<script>
(function(scope) {
    let states = { switch1: false, switch2: false };

    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (!msg || typeof msg.payload === 'undefined') return;

        // Update the state depending on which switch sent the message
        if (msg.topic === "switch") states.switch1 = msg.payload;
        if (msg.topic === "water") states.switch2 = msg.payload;

        // Enable if either switch is true
        const shouldEnable = states.switch1 || states.switch2;

        // Add or remove the 'grayout' class from the grayout-target elements
        const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.grayout-target-2');
        elements.forEach(el => {
            if (shouldEnable) {
                el.classList.remove('grayout');
            } else {
                el.classList.add('grayout');
            }
        });
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Heating trigger
Energy combine
Red error
format:
<style>
.red {
    color: red !important;
    font-weight: bold;
}
</style>

<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(value) {
        const controls = document.querySelectorAll('.red-error');
        controls.forEach(el => {
            if (value === "OK") {
                el.classList.remove('red');
            } else {
                el.classList.add('red');
            }
        });
    });
})(scope);
</script>
